metadata.title: CVE-2020-20896 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in function latm_write_packet inlibavformat/latmenc.c in Ffmpeg 4.2.1, allows attackers to cause a Denialof Service or other unspecified impacts due to a Null pointer dereference.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-20896` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ffmpeg - 7:4.2.7-0ubuntu0.1
libavcodec-extra - 7:4.2.7-0ubuntu0.1
libavcodec-extra58 - 7:4.2.7-0ubuntu0.1
libavcodec58 - 7:4.2.7-0ubuntu0.1
libavdevice58 - 7:4.2.7-0ubuntu0.1
libavfilter-extra - 7:4.2.7-0ubuntu0.1
libavfilter-extra7 - 7:4.2.7-0ubuntu0.1
libavfilter7 - 7:4.2.7-0ubuntu0.1
libavformat58 - 7:4.2.7-0ubuntu0.1
libavresample4 - 7:4.2.7-0ubuntu0.1
libavutil56 - 7:4.2.7-0ubuntu0.1
libpostproc55 - 7:4.2.7-0ubuntu0.1
libswresample3 - 7:4.2.7-0ubuntu0.1
libswscale5 - 7:4.2.7-0ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ffmpeg package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '7:4.2.7-0ubuntu0.1').
qtwebengine-opensource-src package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
vice package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
